sources.title: THE LAST OF THE MOHICANS (1977) with Steve Forrest, Ned Romero, Don Shanks
sources.description: THE LAST OF THE MOHICANS (1977) Starring:  Steve Forrest, Ned Romero, Don Shanks, Robert Tessier Produced by Schick Sunn Classics Uploaded by:  Wm. Thomas Sherman, wts@gunjones.com , www.gunjones.com

metadata.Plot: During the French and Indian War in colonial America, a white scout, with two of his Indian brothers, helps a British officer escort two women through dangerous territory, with both French troops and hostile Indians after them.
metadata.Actors: Steve Forrest, Ned Romero, Andrew Prine
